definition: to attack/to batter/(of waves) to pound against/shock/impact
thoroughfare/to go straight ahead/to rush/to clash

sentences.english: Avoid shock loading and high overloads during mill operation.
sentences.chinese: 軋鋼時，避免衝擊負荷及過負荷運作。

sentences.english: However the market economy system has brought about a strong dash to the heating supply of the cogeneration.
sentences.chinese: 市場經濟體制帶給熱電聯產向採暖供熱以猛烈衝擊。

sentences.english: His vision blurred and a wave of dizziness washed over him.
sentences.chinese: 他的視線模糊了，一陣頭暈目眩衝擊着他。

sentences.english: The global recession has hit Kumi's hometown hard.
sentences.chinese: 全球的經濟衰退給木村的家鄉造成了很大的衝擊。

sentences.english: The overpressure wave is actually the more dangerous of the two.
sentences.chinese: 實際上，這兩類傷害中超壓衝擊波尤甚。

sentences.english: These factors likely weighed heavily on investment banking and capital markets revenue.
sentences.chinese: 這些因素可能會沉重衝擊投資銀行和資本市場的收入。

sentences.english: The financial impact of treating obesity and obesity-related disease is substantial.
sentences.chinese: 注入肥胖症的財務衝擊和與肥胖有關的疾病是可觀的。

sentences.english: That would "have its impact on China as well, " he said.
sentences.chinese: 他說，這必然會對中國經濟發生衝擊。

sentences.english: The incoming tides were bathing the coral reef.
By the revolutionary impact of white deer before the case was originally a typical legal society.
sentences.chinese: 受到革命衝擊之前的白鹿原是典型的宗法制社會。

sentences.english: Equipped with a soft starter, low-impact load at startup.
sentences.chinese: 配有軟啓動器，啓動時衝擊負荷低。

sentences.english: The moire deflectograms of impingement flow field of real rocket exhausted jet are obtained.
sentences.chinese: 獲得了真實火箭燃氣射流衝擊流場莫爾偏折圖。

sentences.english: Like any gemstone, take care not to subject your amethyst jewellery to sharp blows.
sentences.chinese: 就像任何寶石，注意不要受到衝擊大幅貴紫晶首飾。

sentences.english: Objective To study the dose-effects relationship of underwater blast injury.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討水下衝擊傷的量效關係。

sentences.english: The impact impaired the power of the imperialistic country.
sentences.chinese: 這種衝擊削弱了這個帝國主義國家的實力。

sentences.english: Improved Fire Blast now is a Tier 2 Talent. Up from Tier 1.
sentences.chinese: 強化火焰衝擊由一階天賦升爲二階天賦。

definition: to undulate/to fluctuate/wave motion/rise and fall
to hit/to strike/to attack/to crack down on sth/blow/(psychological) shock/percussion (music)
variant of 衝擊|冲击[chong1 ji1]
auxiliary verb introducing future action: may (be able to)/will (cause)/should (enable)/going to
to lead to/to trigger/to initiate/to cause/to evoke (emotions)
